meanings.sent1: I counted to seven before stopping.
meanings.sent2: There are seven days in a week.
meanings.sent3: Why did the cat chase its tail seven times?
meanings.sent4: The seven colors of the rainbow are beautiful.
meanings.sent5: She won the game by rolling a seven on the dice.

meanings.definition: A group or set of seven people or things.
meanings.sent1: The team consisted of seven players.
meanings.sent2: There were seven apples in the basket.
meanings.sent3: The seven puppies played together in the yard.
meanings.sent4: The seven dwarfs lived in the forest.
meanings.sent5: She invited seven friends to her birthday party.

meanings.sent1: She won the race by a seven-second lead.
meanings.sent2: The cake was decorated with seven candles.
meanings.sent3: He wore a shirt with seven stripes.
meanings.sent4: The garden had seven blooming flowers.
meanings.sent5: The book had seven chapters in total.
